textBeforeTable: As a Capital BlueCross member, you have a right to timely access to participating physicians in order to obtain covered services. Participating physicians agree to be available to provide the following types of covered services to members in accordance with the following time frames: Access to Care If you would like further information on the Quality Management Program please call the Customer Service Department toll free at 1.800.962.2242. We will provide you with a description of the program and tell you about our progress in meeting our goals. If you would like to suggest improvements to our program your suggestions are welcome. Continuous improvement in the quality of care and services available to our members is the foundation of our Quality Management Program. The program, through a series of activities, provides for monitoring, evaluating, measuring, improving, and reporting on the quality of care and service provided to our members. Making sure your health needs are attended to in a timely manner Quality Management Program Preventive Health Care Preauthorization Requirements Preauthorization Program Condition Management Case Management After Hours Care Access Standards Descriptions
